Set usage alert thresholds

Source: R/utils-usage-tracking.R
kvk_usage_alert.Rd

Configure alerts for when API usage exceeds specified thresholds. Alerts are shown when calling kvk_usage_report().

Usage

kvk_usage_alert(
  max_calls = NULL,
  max_cost = NULL,
  period = c("month", "year", "total")
)

Arguments

max_calls

Integer, maximum number of API calls before alert. Set to NULL to disable call limit alert.

max_cost

Numeric, maximum cost in euros before alert. Set to NULL to disable cost limit alert.

period

Character string, period for limits:

  • "month": Limits apply per calendar month

  • "year": Limits apply per calendar year

  • "total": Limits apply to all-time usage

Value

NULL (invisible). Alerts are stored as options.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Set monthly limit of 100 calls
kvk_usage_alert(max_calls = 100, period = "month")

# Set yearly cost limit of EUR50
kvk_usage_alert(max_cost = 50, period = "year")

# Set both limits
kvk_usage_alert(max_calls = 500, max_cost = 25, period = "month")

# Disable alerts
kvk_usage_alert(max_calls = NULL, max_cost = NULL)
} # }
